ScriptGroup.name: Planeswalker1 FE Capture

Script.name: pw1SingleEventHandler
Script.script: function pw1SingleEventHandler(eventName, argument) if eventName == "ageCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["age"] = argument elseif eventName == "arcanaCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["arcana"] = argument elseif eventName == "bleedingLimbsCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["bleeding limbs"] = argument elseif eventName == "deityCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["deity"] = argument elseif eventName == "dominantHandCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["dominant hand"] = argument elseif eventName == "estimatedBleedingCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["estimated bleeding"] = argument elseif eventName == "experienceCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["experience"] = string.gsub(argument,"n","") elseif eventName == "experienceToLevelCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["experience to level"] = string.gsub(argument,"n","") elseif eventName == "genderCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["gender"] = argument elseif eventName == "htCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["ht"] = argument if argument == 0 then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum ht"] = 0 elseif Planeswalker.interfaceTable["ht"] > Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum ht"] then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum ht"] = argument end raiseEvent("htCaptureDouble", argument, Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum ht"]) elseif eventName == "languageCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["language"] = argument elseif eventName == "languagesCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["languages"] = argument elseif eventName == "leftHandCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["left hand"] = argument elseif eventName == "levelCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["level"] = argument elseif eventName == "maimedLimbsCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maimed limbs"] = argument elseif eventName == "martialArtCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["martial art"] = argument elseif eventName == "martialArtsCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["martial arts"] = argument elseif eventName == "mutilatedLimbsCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["mutilated limbs"] = argument elseif eventName == "patronMoonCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["patron moon"] = argument elseif eventName == "positionCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["position"] = argument elseif eventName == "postTitleCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["posttitle"] = argument elseif eventName == "preTitleCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["pretitle"] = argument elseif eventName == "professionCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["profession"] = argument elseif eventName == "ptCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["pt"] = argument if argument == 0 then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum pt"] = 0 elseif Planeswalker.interfaceTable["pt"] > Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum pt"] then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum pt"] = argument end raiseEvent("ptCaptureDouble", argument, Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum pt"]) elseif eventName == "raceCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["race"] = argument elseif eventName == "rightHandCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["right hand"] = argument elseif eventName == "roomCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["room"] = argument elseif eventName == "rtCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["rt"] = argument if argument == 0 then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum rt"] = 0 elseif Planeswalker.interfaceTable["rt"] > Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum rt"] then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum rt"] = argument end raiseEvent("rtCaptureDouble", argument, Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum rt"]) elseif eventName == "skillpointsCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["skillpoints"] = argument elseif eventName == "specializationCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["specialization"] = argument elseif eventName == "spellsCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["spells"] = argument elseif eventName == "subraceCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["subrace"] = argument elseif eventName == "stCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["st"] = argument if argument == 0 then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum st"] = 0 elseif Planeswalker.interfaceTable["st"] > Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum st"] then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum st"] = argument end raiseEvent("stCaptureDouble", argument, Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum st"]) elseif eventName == "stanceCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["stance"] = argument elseif eventName == "trueNameCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["true name"] = argument elseif eventName == "utCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["ut"] = argument if argument == 0 then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum ut"] = 0 elseif Planeswalker.interfaceTable["ut"] > Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum ut"] then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum ut"] = argument end raiseEvent("utCaptureDouble", argument, Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum ut"]) elseif eventName == "woundedLimbsCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["wounded limbs"] = argument end end

Script.name: pw1DoubleEventHandler
Script.script: function pw1DoubleEventHandler(eventName, argumentOne, argumentTwo) if eventName == "essenceCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["essence"] = argumentOne Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum essence"] = argumentTwo elseif eventName == "fameCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["fame"] = argumentOne Planeswalker.interfaceTable["lifetime fame"] = argumentTwo elseif eventName == "lessonsCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["lessons"] = argumentOne Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum lessons"] = argumentTwo elseif eventName == "nameCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["first name"] = argumentOne Planeswalker.interfaceTable["last name"] = argumentTwo elseif eventName == "staminaCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["stamina"] = argumentOne Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum stamina"] = argumentTwo elseif eventName == "vitalityCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["vitality"] = argumentOne Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum vitality"] = argumentTwo elseif eventName == "willpowerCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable["willpower"] = argumentOne Planeswalker.interfaceTable["maximum willpower"] = argumentTwo end end

Script.name: pw1EventHandler
pw1QuadEventHandler
Script.script:
function pw1QuadEventHandler(eventName, argumentOne, argumentTwo, argumentThree, argumentFour) if eventName == "limbCapture" then Planeswalker.interfaceTable.Limbs[argumentOne] = Planeswalker.interfaceTable.Limbs[argumentOne] or {} Planeswalker.interfaceTable.Limbs[argumentOne]["status"] = argumentTwo Planeswalker.interfaceTable.Limbs[argumentOne]["wounds"] = tonumber(argumentThree) Planeswalker.interfaceTable.Limbs[argumentOne]["bleedrate"] = argumentFour
local bleedingLimbs = 0 local woundedLimbs = 0 local maimedLimbs = 0 local mutilatedLimbs = 0 local estimatedBleeding = 0
for limbName, limbTable in pairs(Planeswalker.interfaceTable.Limbs) do if limbTable ~= nil then if limbTable["status"] == "maimed" then maimedLimbs = maimedLimbs + 1 elseif limbTable["status"] == "mutilated" then mutilatedLimb = mutilatedLimb + 1 end
if limbTable["wounds"] ~= 0 then woundedLimbs = woundedLimbs + 1 end
if limbTable["bleedrate"] == "slightly" then bleedingLimbs = bleedingLimbs + 1 estimatedBleeding = estimatedBleeding + 1 elseif limbTable["bleedrate"] == "lightly" then bleedingLimbs = bleedingLimbs + 1 estimatedBleeding = estimatedBleeding + 2 elseif limbTable["bleedrate"] == "moderately" then bleedingLimbs = bleedingLimbs + 1 estimatedBleeding = estimatedBleeding + 3 elseif limbTable["bleedrate"] == "slightly" then bleedingLimbs = bleedingLimbs + 1 estimatedBleeding = estimatedBleeding + 4 elseif limbTable["bleedrate"] == "seriously" then bleedingLimbs = bleedingLimbs + 1 estimatedBleeding = estimatedBleeding + 5 elseif limbTable["bleedrate"] == "profusely" then bleedingLimbs = bleedingLimbs + 1 estimatedBleeding = estimatedBleeding + 6 end
estimatedBleeding = estimatedBleeding * 3 end end
raiseEvent("bleedingLimbsCapture",bleedingLimbs) raiseEvent("woundedLimbsCapture",woundedLimbs) raiseEvent("maimedLimbsCapture",maimedLimbs) raiseEvent("mutilatedLimbsCapture",mutilatedLimbs) raiseEvent("estimatedBleedingCapture",estimatedBleeding) end end

Trigger.name: Limb Capture
Trigger.script: deleteLine() raiseEvent("limbCapture", matches[2], matches[3], matches[4], matches[5])
